text:
Invalid direct reference to form I get this error when I open up page and don't 
log in right away, if I log in right away everything works correctly
creator: ckpaulus@yahoo.com
medthomas@ntlworld.com
text:
I'd love to help but there is nowhere near enough information in this bug 
report to start investigating. Please read the guidance available at 
http://jakarta.apache.org/tomcat/bugreport.html

Example configuration files and/or web applications that reproduce the problem 
are particularly helpful.

creator: ckpaulus@yahoo.com
text:
I have my web.xml set up <session-config>
                            <session-timeout>120</session-timeout>
                         </session-config>
I do not reference my login page directly I am redirected from my index.jsp.  
If I log in right away everything works correctly, but if I open my page and do 
not log in until after 2 hours I get the error message.
